title: Tech Conference 2023
description: A conference for tech enthusiasts to discuss the latest trends.
info:
# Event Concert Details

## Event Information
- **Event Name**: Neon Lights Music Festival 2024
- **Date**: Saturday, March 23, 2024
- **Time**: 
  - Gates Open: 4:00 PM
  - Show Starts: 6:00 PM
- **Venue**: Impact Arena, Muang Thong Thani
- **Organizer**: Beat Nation Entertainment

## Lineup Artists
1. **Headliner**: 
   - Ed Sheeran
2. **Supporting Acts**: 
   - Tyla
   - Lauv
   - Violette Wautier
   - Three Man Down

## Ticket Information
- **Ticket Tiers**: 
  - **VIP**: ฿6,900 (Front Zone + Exclusive Merchandise Pack)
  - **Gold Standing**: ฿4,500
  - **Silver Standing**: ฿3,200
  - **Student Ticket**: ฿2,500 (Valid student ID required)
- **Purchase Channels**: 
  - Official Website: www.neonlightsfest2024.com
  - Thai Ticket Major outlets
  - Line Official: @NeonLights2024

## Event Highlights
- Live DJ sets between performances
- Interactive light and laser show
- Food trucks and beverage stalls
- Photo booth with artist backdrops

## Rules & Regulations
- **Prohibited Items**: 
  - Professional cameras (DSLR, mirrorless)
  - Outside food and drinks
  - Large bags (over A4 size)
  - Weapons or sharp objects
- **Age Restriction**: All ages welcome (Under 15 must be accompanied by adult)

## Contact Information
- **Email**: info@neonlightsfest2024.com
- **Phone**: 02-123-4567 (10:00 AM - 6:00 PM)
- **Social Media**: 
  - Facebook: /NeonLightsFestTH
  - Instagram: @NeonLightsFest_TH
  - Twitter: @NeonLightsTH

---

> *Note: All information is subject to change. Please check official channels for updates.*
